H0.text: Liquid water is the most necessary factor for life to develop on another planet.

H1.text: Rocky surfaces are most necessary for life to develop on another planet.

H2.text: Warm soil is the most necessary condition for life to develop on another planet.

H3.text: Atmospheric oxygen is the most necessary factor for life to develop on another planet.

A4.text: The existence of liquid water, and to a lesser extent its gaseous and solid forms, on Earth are vital to the existence of life on Earth as we know it.

A5.text: All known forms of life depend on water.
